7433795785B315B3.title: Call me Amazon delivery driver the way I be packaging

display.title: Do we need to package?
description: Some stages listed on this page output Small/Tiny Dusts, or Nuggets. These have little use in such a form, so it's never a bad idea to route these into a &&dPacker&&r to "&&7compress&&r" them into their full forms.

If you're having problems with the Packer filling up with too few Nuggets and clogging your buffer, then you may want to consider using a &&6GregTech Robot Arm&&r set to "Supply Exact". Send your Nuggets in 9 at a time, and you can consider this a problem solved!
